title: Science Teacher Professional Development Course Using AR-Based Collaborative Constructivism

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Hands-on education utilizing AR apps in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can visually and interactively explain complex scientific theories through AR-based science concept simulations
Learners can develop knowledge-sharing strategies with peer teachers when designing AR-based lessons via collaborative problem-solving activities
Learners can create assessment rubrics applying constructivist teaching methods during the AR app-based microlearning content production process

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
